item.title: Scrum for two
item.description: Scrum for two? No, the title isnâ€™t a misnomer, what follows are my experiences using scrum methodologies within a two-person team for a final year college project. Some personal background In 2016 I found myself back in full-time education, in the midst of an aggressively paced computer science conversion course. Targeted towards existing graduates from non-computing disciplines, my classmates were a motley bunch ranging from musicians and fine artists to engineering and even agricultural graduates.
